alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 29 at 3:45PM MST until July 29 at 5:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 345 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Highway 89 is being overtopped by water north of Doney Park at mile post marker 425. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Flagstaff, Hutchison Acres, Timberline, Fernwood, Wupatki Trails, Doney Park and Little Elden Spring Horse Camp. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 423 and 428. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Schultz Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the . Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
